name: WN_TSUNAGARU
description:
A game where you help animals in cage and connect a lot of animals behind a dog.  Hit a bullet on the Cage. 

...The save function dose not work when the browser is closed.

  • When playing with the mouse
    Moving                   Drag
    Shoot bullet            Left Click
    Pause                     Right click
  • When playing with the keyboard
    Moving                   Arrow keys
    Shoot  bullet           Space key
    Pause                     Q key

...negi
